name: Animaddicts
description:
Animaddicts is an arcade game.

The gameplay of Animaddicts is creative and each player can throw a ball at the enemies to transform to a ball.
An enemy partially transformed in ball cannot move until it dissolve ( shakes it off ).



Features and Content
  • Two Characters to choose and play
  • All level are procedurally and ramdomly generated to add more randomness to each gameplay.
  • Full Controller Support

Controller Support
This game has Full Controller Support.
